description.default: Main Environment - Unique name along with its [.crm] extension. Example "unqda99ac46cfcd47eba73db6d73de2e.crm". Please note that the extension 'crm', 'crm[x]'etc. Is region dependent. Found in Session details in Power Apps portal

label.description: Main Environment - Unique name along with its [.crm] extension. Example "unqda99ac46cfcd47eba73db6d73de2e.crm". Please note that the extension 'crm', 'crm[x]'etc. Is region dependent. Found in Session details in Power Apps portal

displayname.default: Environment Unique Name of CoE Main

label.description: Environment Unique Name of CoE Main
